Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory19.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hehehe, Nanami's wish is finally fulfilled.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nanami can die happy now.', 4: '1'}
{2: "You're not making a bomb, are you?!", 3: '8', 4: 'What are you smiling about, Nanami?', 5: '8'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Commandant?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Commandant, what are you doing here? Nanami's not ready yet...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Preparing for what?', 3: '12', 4: 'Preparing for detonation?!', 5: '15'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Ah, was Commandant stalking Nanami?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'You always appear where Nanami is, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Detonation... Did you think Nanami was making a bomb, Commandant?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Even though Nanami damages the base from time to time, Nanami would never blow up the base!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Commandant will be mad if the base is destroyed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami doesn't want to make Commandant mad...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "But since you're here now, I guess I'll just show you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Commandant, you said you won't be lonely as long as everyone's here, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I did say that.', 3: '23', 4: "I don't remember that.", 5: '24'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Right? Nanami remembers everything Commandant has said!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'To prevent Commandant from feeling lonely, Nanami made a special present for you!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Look! It's a 1:16 Nanami figure!", 4: '1'}
{2: '...A model? Oh, a figure model...', 3: '28', 4: 'It looks pretty good.', 5: '28'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hehe, don't underestimate Minimi! Its performance and abilities are top-class!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "If you buy now, I'll throw in a super remote that can control it from up to 100m away for free!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Just press this button and Minimi will launch a rocket punch!', 4: '1'}
{1: '100', 2: 'What would I use this function for anyway...', 3: '34', 4: 'I need to pay for it?', 5: '35'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Of course it's used to attack enemies, it'll even explode if it hits the target!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "It's just a saying!"}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "There may be a day when Nanami disappears from Commandant's life.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "And maybe you won't miss me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'But... If Nanami is gone and you miss Nanami, you can treat the figure as me.', 4: '1'}
